description.en: A proud princess with an iron will and a profound desire for justice. Once bent on taking vengeance upon the Archadian Empire、 she sets out in pursuit of a great power、 but has a change of heart during her travels with Vaan and Balthier when she learns what it means to confront the past and be free of its shackles.
description.jp:
強い意思と正義感を持つ誇り高き王女。
祖国ダルマスカ王国を侵略した
アルケイディア帝国への復讐に燃え 
強大な「力」を求めて奔走していたが 
ヴァンたち仲間との旅を通して 
過去と向き合うことの意味を知り 
自由を手にすべく 過去を断ち切った。

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en: Magic BRV attack\nGrants [Magical Attack Up] for 5 turns
desc.gl: Magic BRV attack\nSelf: 5 turns MAG ATK Up I
desc.jp: 魔法BRV攻撃\n自身に5ACTION「魔法攻撃力小アップ」付与

desc.en: Slightly raises party Max BRV while buffed
desc.gl: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV with active buffs

short_desc.gl: All Buff Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV
short_desc.jp: バフブーストオール：味方全員の最大BRVがアップ

name.jp: 北斗骨砕斬エクステンド

desc.en:
「Northswain's Glow」 use +1

When using 「Northswain's Glow」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly improves 「Magical Attack Up」
- Triggers an HP attack after use
desc.gl:
Nordswain's Glow use +1

When using Nordswain's Glow:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight MAG ATK Up boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
desc.jp:
「北斗骨砕斬」の使用回数＋1

「北斗骨砕斬」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が3HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「魔法攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップ
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

short_desc.gl: Nordswain's Glow Extension: Boost to Nordswain's Glow
short_desc.jp: 北斗骨砕斬エクステンド：「北斗骨砕斬」の性能アップ

name.jp: バフアタックスピードオール

desc.en: Moderately raises party Attack and Speed while buffed
desc.gl: Moderately raises party's ATK, SPD with active buffs
desc.jp: 自身に強化効果が付与されている時\n味方全員の攻撃力と素早さを中アップ

short_desc.gl: All Buff Attack Speed: Raises party's ATK, SPD
short_desc.jp: バフアタックスピードオール：味方全員の攻撃力と素早さがアップ

name.jp: 聖光爆裂斬エクステンド

desc.en:
「Heaven's Wrath」 use +1

When using 「Heaven's Wrath」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly improves 「Physical Attack Up」
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Up」 and grants it to party
- Moderately improves 「Max BRV Up」 granted to self
- Triggers an HP attack after use

After using 「Heaven's Wrath」:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」 for 6 turns
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
desc.gl:
Heaven's Wrath use +1

When using Heaven's Wrath:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight PHY ATK Up boost
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost, extended to party
 • Moderate own MAX BRV Up boost
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Heaven's Wrath:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage) for 6 turns
desc.jp:
「聖光爆裂斬」の使用回数＋1

「聖光爆裂斬」使用時
・「聖光爆裂斬」のBRV威力極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「物理攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップ
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果が小アップし味方全体化
・自身の「最大BRVアップ」の効果はさらに中アップ
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

「聖光爆裂斬」使用後
通常「BRV攻撃」が6ACTION
以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ

short_desc.gl: Heaven's Wrath Extension: Boost to Heaven's Wrath
short_desc.jp: 聖光爆裂斬エクステンド：「聖光爆裂斬」の性能アップ

- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using Maelstrom's Bolt:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While equipping EX+ weapon Sword of Kings (XII)+ or passive ability Roaring Thunder Extension:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

When using 「Ark Blast」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While 「Dynast King's Bloodline」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」 into 「BRV Attack++」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency compared to 「BRV Attack+」
- Turns 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Tremendously raises total BRV potency compared to 「HP Attack+」
desc.gl:
When using Ark Blast:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Dynast-King's Bloodline active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage over BRV Attack+)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage over HP Attack+)

　「HP攻撃＋」よりも合計BRV威力も極大アップ
